title.rendered: Invitation to presentation of Q2 2020 results

content.rendered:
Oslo, Norway – August 17, 2020:

AqualisBraemar ASA (“AqualisBraemar”) will release its second quarter 2020 results on Thursday, August 27, 2020 at approximately 06:00 Central European Time (CEST).

The earnings release concerning the second quarter 2020 results, the first half 2020 report and a corresponding slide presentation will be posted on www.newsweb.no and on AqualisBraemar’s website, www.aqualisbraemar.com.

An audio webcast of the quarterly results will be released the same day at 14:00 CEST. To watch the webcast, please visit this page.

For further information, please contact:

Investors and financial media

Kim Boman, CFO, AqualisBraemar ASA
Telephone: +47 959 63 912

Other media enquiries

Endre Johansen, Corporate Communications AS
Telephone: +47 41 61 06 05
Email: endre.johansen@corpcom.no

About AqualisBraemar ASA
AqualisBraemar ASA (OSE: Aqua) offers independent consultancy services to the offshore energy (oil & gas and renewables), shipping and insurance industries. The group employs specialist engineers, naval architects, master mariners, loss adjusters and technical consultants in 35 countries worldwide. AqualisBraemar ASA operates under three brands:
  • AqualisBraemar: a leading adjusting, marine and offshore consultancy to the energy, shipping and insurance industries
  • AqualisBraemar Yacht Services: a specialised marine consultant to the superyacht market
  • OWC: an independent consultancy to the offshore renewables sector

excerpt.rendered: AqualisBraemar ASA will release its second quarter 2020 results on Thursday, August 27, 2020 at approximately 06:00 Central European Time (CEST).

jetpack-related-posts.title: Invitation to presentation of Q1 2020 results
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar ASA ("AqualisBraemar") will release its first quarter 2020 results on Thursday, May 28, 2020 at approximately 06:00 Central European Time (CEST).

jetpack-related-posts.title: Invitation to presentation of Q3 2020 results
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar ASA will release its third quarter 2020 results on Thursday, October 29, 2020 at approximately 06:00 Central European Time (CET).

jetpack-related-posts.title: Invitation to presentation of Q4 2019 results
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar ASA ("AqualisBraemar") will release its fourth quarter 2019 results on Thursday, February 27, 2020 at approximately 07:00 am Central European Time (CET).

jetpack-related-posts.title: Q2 2020 financial results
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: “The second quarter of 2020 has presented some unique challenges to AqualisBraemar, our employees, and our clients. However, these challenges fade in comparison to those experienced by the individuals directly impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic...”

jetpack-related-posts.title: Q3 2020 financial results
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: “In line with normal seasonality, the third quarter of 2020 was less active than previous quarters. Regardless, the business continues to show growth and improved profitability relative to the same period last year.”

jetpack-related-posts.title: Invitation to webcast in connection with LOC Group acquisition
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar ASA invites investors, analysts and media to a live webcast presentation following today’s announced acquisition of LOC Group. See separate stock exchange announcement dated 23 November 2020 for further details about the transaction.
